Text: How do we know we can trust this?

same way you trust any other torrents.  dont.  run a malware scan when download it, try it in an isolated environment (stand-alone, a vm, etc).  im about to install this in a virtual machine my self to test out what updates i need to integrate in my disk.  ill report what i find.
or maybe i just lied.  i thought this was the xp update, so im not going to post w/ an update.  1st part of the post still applies.
